name: Raymond Scott
description:
I am a single Father of 1 kid of 3years old with a good job and a great family. I believe in what i have and am honest, loyal, funny (too sarcastic at times), caring, fun loving and drama free. I am looking for someone that has the same qualities to meet and see where things go from there. Sorry to be blunt but I am not into one night stands or friends with benefits. I am very easy going, so if there is anything else that you want to know, just ask. I believe there is someone out there for everyone the trick is finding them
I work as an administrative for a company of friend of mine online and i get paid and my pay is ok for me cause i believe in what i have
